Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near 115th/Spaulding
ShortDescription: Southbound 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 119th, Pulaski and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/Spaulding.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark, #29 State and #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Kinzie
ShortDescription: 22 Clark, 29 State, 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB: State, Chicago, LaSalle, Washington & State; NB: State, Randolph, LaSalle, Chicago & State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark, #29 State and #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/Kinzie due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, LaSalle, Washington and State.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Randolph, LaSalle, Chicago and State.

Allow extra travel time.
